content: **** please note **** this pattern is now free on my blog https //www hookedbyrobin com/blog/2019/05/crochet-mermaid-tail-free-pattern html with lots of photographs to help you along the way this pattern is ideal for beginners and advanced crocheters alike this adult size mermaid tail blanket pattern comes with permission to sell your finished items got a question i m happy to help just drop me a message or check my blog post which has lots of frequently asked questions and answers about this pattern here https //www hookedbyrobin com/blog/2016/09/crochet-mermaid-tail-blanket-pattern html i would love to see any finished items you make - you can find me on facebook https //www facebook com/hookedbyrobin or with the hashtag #hookedbyrobin on instagram i am @puddnhead
